meanings.sent1: The soup was savorless, with no delicious taste.
meanings.sent2: The plain rice was savorless, needing some seasoning.
meanings.sent3: The savorless salad made everyone at the party yawn.
meanings.sent4: Her savorless jokes fell flat at the comedy club.
meanings.sent5: The savorless meal left a disappointing aftertaste.

meanings.sent1: The movie was savorless, lacking excitement or intrigue.
meanings.sent2: The lecture was savorless, making it hard to stay awake.
meanings.sent3: His savorless stories put his friends to sleep.
meanings.sent4: The savorless book felt like a long, boring journey.
meanings.sent5: The savorless conversation made time drag on endlessly.
